overview: First Loves/Kakyuusei OAV (1995) is mainly centered on Kakeru and his relationship with four girls from his high school. It focuses on one girl per episode - the cute and friendly Urara, the forsaken tennis girl Rie, the dog-owning painter Hikari and the tough-fighting motorcycle girl. Which girl will Kakeru choose to be with by the end ?
title: First Loves
